content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab Station at Position (6.5, -57.5)
- Consists of a lab that is powered and ready for research.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when no lab is found on the map
- Ensure that a lab is placed on the map before attempting to perform research-related actions.

### Errors due to lack of automation science packs
- Make sure to craft or acquire automation science packs to conduct research in the lab.
